title: Healthy Avocado Salad
instructions: 1. Cut the avocados in half, remove the pit, and scoop the flesh into a bowl. 2. Add the cherry tomatoes, red onion, and cilantro. 3. Squeeze lime juice over the mixture and season with salt and pepper. 4. Gently toss to combine and serve immediately.

title: Quinoa and Black Bean Bowl
ingredients: 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed
instructions: 1. In a pot, combine quinoa and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes. 2. Fluff quinoa with a fork and let cool. 3. In a bowl, combine quinoa, black beans, corn, and red bell pepper. 4. Top with diced avocado and serve with lime wedges.

title: Grilled Chicken with Vegetables
instructions: 1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. 2. Toss the vegetables with olive oil, salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning. 3. Grill the chicken for 6-7 minutes on each side until cooked through. 4. Grill the vegetables for 4-5 minutes until tender. Serve together.
